flow.title: Get your car insurance quote
flow.bodyHtml: We’ll ask about your car, usage, drivers, claims and convictions.

display.title: Car insurance quote
display.subtitle: UK private motor
display.bodyHtml: Answer a few questions and we’ll generate a quote. You can review details before you continue.

display.title: Quick tip
display.bodyHtml: Having your registration number can reduce the number of questions.

questions.title: What type of cover would you like?
When would you like cover to start?
questions.help: Start date must be within 60 days.

questions.title: Do you know the registration number?
Registration number
questions.help: If you don’t have it, we can still quote but you may need it to buy.

content.html: We can use your registration to look up vehicle details where available.

display.title: About you
display.bodyHtml: You’ll be the main policyholder and responsible for payments and managing the policy.

flow.title: Your car
flow.bodyHtml: Tell us about the vehicle you want to insure.

display.title: Your car
display.bodyHtml: These details help insurers confirm the vehicle and price your policy.

questions.title: Are you the owner of the vehicle?
Has this car been modified in any way?
questions.help: This includes changes from the manufacturer’s original specification, e.g. alloys, body kits, tow bar.

flow.title: Usage
flow.bodyHtml: Tell us how the vehicle will be used and where it’s kept.

display.title: How you use the car
display.bodyHtml: This helps insurers understand your driving risk and usage pattern.

questions.title: Estimated annual mileage
questions.help: 20 miles a day, every day, is about 7,300 miles a year.

questions.title: What will the car be used for?
Where is the car usually kept overnight?
Will the car be used on a track day?

display.title: Drivers
display.bodyHtml: We’ll insure the main policyholder and any additional drivers you add.

questions.title: Do you want to add additional drivers?
questions.help: Adding all regular drivers can help avoid issues at claim time.

flow.title: Claims history
flow.bodyHtml: Tell us about any claims or incidents in the last 5 years.

display.title: Claims history
display.bodyHtml: Please include all incidents, even if no payment was made.

questions.title: Have you had any motor claims or incidents in the last 5 years?

flow.title: Convictions
flow.bodyHtml: Tell us about any motoring convictions or disqualifications.

display.title: Convictions
display.bodyHtml: Please answer carefully. Not disclosing convictions can affect your policy or a claim.

questions.title: Do you have any motoring convictions, fixed penalties, or disqualifications in the last 5 years?

display.title: Declarations
display.bodyHtml: These statements help us provide an accurate quote.

questions.title: I confirm I have read and understood the privacy notice.
I confirm the information I’ve given is true to the best of my knowledge.

display.title: Your preferences
display.bodyHtml: You can change your marketing preferences at any time.

questions.title: Would you like to receive marketing from us?

display.title: Check your details
display.subtitle: Car insurance
display.bodyHtml: Review your answers before viewing your quote.

display.title: Key details
display.bodyHtml: This page is a playback of what you’ve entered. If something looks wrong, go back and change it.

display.title: Your cover
display.bodyHtml:
Cover: (selected)
Start date: (selected)
Excess: (selected)

display.title: Next step
display.bodyHtml: When you continue, we’ll generate your quote based on the details provided.

flow.title: Your quote
flow.bodyHtml: Here’s your quote based on the details entered.

display.title: Your quote
display.subtitle: Car insurance
display.bodyHtml: This is an example quote display. In a live integration, pricing would come from your rating engine.

questions.title: How would you like to pay?
questions.help: Monthly payments are typically an instalment plan and may include interest.

display.title: Annual payment
display.bodyHtml: Pay the full premium upfront.

display.title: Monthly payments
display.bodyHtml: Example instalments shown for illustration only. Interest may apply depending on the provider.

display.title: What’s included
display.bodyHtml:
Cover: (selected)
Key assumptions: (selected)

display.title: Important
display.bodyHtml: This quote assumes the information provided is accurate. You can amend answers before you buy.

display.title: Next steps
display.bodyHtml: Continue to choose payment details and complete purchase.

flow.title: Payment
flow.bodyHtml: Choose how you’d like to pay and enter payment details.

display.title: Payment for your Car insurance
display.subtitle: Choose a payment option
display.bodyHtml: Enter your payment details to proceed. In production, integrate a secure payment provider.

display.title: Payment options
display.bodyHtml:
Annual: pay in full now.
Monthly: pay by instalments (usually Direct Debit).

questions.title: Payment method
questions.help: Monthly instalments are usually collected by Direct Debit.

display.title: Important
display.bodyHtml: Payment fields here are for demonstration only.

display.title: Final checks
display.bodyHtml: Before completing payment, ensure your details are correct.

questions.title: How would you like to receive your documents?
I confirm I am authorised to make this payment and the details provided are correct.
